name: A Frog's Guide To Eating Flies
name_original: A Frog's Guide To Eating Flies
description:
In this handy guide you'll learn how to use your tongue to eat flies (as a frog).

Playable with Keyboard/Gamepad/Touchscreen

Controls:
Move - WASD / Arrow Keys / [Analog Stick / D-Pad]
Use Tongue - Space / [A]
Attach Tongue - Hold Space / Hold [A]
Undo - Q / [Left Trigger]
Redo - E / [Right Trigger]
Reset - R / [Back]
Menu - T / [Start]
Fullscreen - F
Mute - M
